name.type.description: Type of content to generate with Pika video, like 'link', 'text', etc.

name.createdAt.description: Date and time when Pika video is generated

name.imageUrl.description: Reference image for the video to be generated

name.model.description: Model version used for video generation

name.effect.description: Name of style parameter for switching between different models or styles

name.ingredientsModel.description: Model version used for video generation

name.pikaBot.description: Name of the Pika video generator

description.ingredients.message: If you want to upload multiple images to generate your own video, turn on this button.

description.imageUrl.message: For multi-image create video tasks, you must upload multiple images.

description.prompt.message: Prompt words for generating Pika video

placeholder.select.description: Placeholder text in the select field

placeholder.prompt.message: Enter prompt words for the video style to generate, such as: moving
placeholder.prompt.description: Placeholder text in the prompt field

button.precise.description: Button text for generating Pika video

button.creative.description: Button text for generating Pika video

button.generate.description: Button text for generating Pika video

button.uploadImageUrl.description: Button text for uploading an image

button.uploadVideoUrl.description: Button text for uploading a video

message.uploadReferencesExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded images exceeds the limit

message.uploadReferencesSuccess.description: Success message when images are successfully uploaded

message.uploadReferencesError.message: Image upload failed, please try again later
message.uploadReferencesError.description: Error message when image upload fails

message.startingTask.description: Message when a drawing task is starting

message.startTaskSuccess.description: Success message when a task starts successfully

message.startTaskFailed.message: Failed to start task, please contact the administrator
message.startTaskFailed.description: Error message when starting a drawing task fails

message.usedUp.message: Your credits are used up, please purchase more credits to continue using
message.usedUp.description: Message when credits are used up

message.generating.description: Message when image is being generated

message.downloadVideo.description: Message when image is being generated

message.extendVideo.description: Message when image is being generated

message.uploadVideoExceed.message: The number of initial frame images uploaded exceeds the limit
message.uploadVideoExceed.description: Error message when the number of initial frame images uploaded exceeds the limit

message.uploadVideoSizeExceed.description: Error message when upload file size exceeds 10MB!

message.uploadVideoTypeFailed.message: The uploaded file must be in MP4 format!
message.uploadVideoTypeFailed.description: Error message when the uploaded file type must be MP4

message.uploadStartImageExceed.message: The number of initial frame images uploaded exceeds the limit
message.uploadStartImageExceed.description: Error message when the number of initial frame images uploaded exceeds the limit

message.uploadEndImageExceed.message: The number of final frame images uploaded exceeds the limit
message.uploadEndImageExceed.description: Error message when the number of final frame images uploaded exceeds the limit

message.uploadStartImageError.message: Failed to upload initial frame image

message.uploadVideoError.description: Error message when uploading video fails

message.uploadEndImageError.message: Failed to upload final frame image
message.uploadEndImageError.description: Error message when uploading final frame image fails

message.uploadDocumentsError.description: Error message when uploading documents fails

message.noOperations.description: Message when no operations are available

message.noTasks.message: No historical tasks, please click on the left to generate video
